tr_quotes.quote: Oyun bitince piyon da şah da aynı kutuya koyulur.
tr_quotes.author: İtalyan Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimiz farklı gemilerden gelmiş olabiliriz ama şimdi hepimiz aynı teknedeyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

tr_quotes.quote: Aşk herkesi eşit kılar.
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: İyi olmak kolaydır zor olan eşit olmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Eşitlik arayan mezara gitmeli.
tr_quotes.author: Alman Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Güneş yükseldiği zaman, herkes için yükselir.
tr_quotes.author: Küba Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Eşitlik her zaman adalet demek değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Semih Toygar

tr_quotes.quote: Adaletsizliğin en büyüğü adil olmayıp adil gibi görünmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Platon

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar kuvvetçe zekâca olmasalar bile anlaşma ve hak yolu ile eşit olurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Kadın erkekle bir kez eşit hale getirildi mi artık ondan üstün olur
tr_quotes.author: Sokrates

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar doğuştan eşittirler ama bunu sonuna kadar sürdüremezler.
tr_quotes.author: Charles de Montesquieu

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlüğün de eşitliğin de adaletin de kaynağı ulusal egemenliktir.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Zayıf daima adalet ve eşitlik ister hâlbuki bunlar kuvvetlinin umurunda bile değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlığın başına ne geldiyse eşitlik olmaması yüzünden geldi.
tr_quotes.author: Pierre Leroux

tr_quotes.quote: Kadınlar bütün baskı ve zulüm zincirlerinden kurtulmadıkça özgürlükten bahsedilemez.
tr_quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

tr_quotes.quote: Allahtan korkun ve çocuklarınızın arasını (ihsanda hatta sevmede bile) eşit tutun.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Muhammed

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların en kötüsü en fazla kabuğuna çekilendir en iyisi de sevgilerini eşitçe herkesle paylaşandır.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Efendiler sosyal hayatın kökeni aile hayatıdır. Aile açıklamaya gerek yoktur ki kadın ve erkekten oluşur.
tr_quotes.author: Atatürk

tr_quotes.quote: Eşitliğin, tabiatın bir kanunu olduğu doğru değildir çünkü tabiat eşitliğin ne olduğunu bilmez. Onun en yüce kanunu bağımsızlıktır. Kanunlar bile insanı doğa karşısında eşit kılamaz.
tr_quotes.author: Vauvenargues

tr_quotes.quote: Eşit haklar edinmiş kadınlar, oltadan kaçıp kurtulmak için karaya vurmuş balıklara benzerler. Balıkçıların en tembeli bile, ölü balık tutmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Karl Kraus

tr_quotes.quote: Doğa birine başka diğerine başka davranmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Tao Öğretisi

tr_quotes.quote: Eşitlik…İnsan örgütlenmesinin sonucudur. Eşit doğmayız.
tr_quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

tr_quotes.quote: Eşitlik arayan, mezarlıklara gitmeli.
tr_quotes.author: Alman Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Aşk, herkesi eşit kılar.
tr_quotes.author: Cervantes

tr_quotes.quote: Eşitlik kolay değildir ama üstünlük acı doludur.
tr_quotes.author: Serere

tr_quotes.quote: Özgürlük doruk ise, eşitlik temeldir.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

tr_quotes.quote: Güneş yükseldiği zaman, herkes için yükselir.
tr_quotes.author: Küba Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Cinsiyet eşitliği sadece bir hedef değildir. Cinsiyet eşitliği, yoksulluğu azaltmanın, sürdürülebilir bir kalkınma yaratmanın ve iyi yönetim oluşturmanın temelidir.
tr_quotes.author: Kofi Annan

tr_quotes.quote: Eşitlik olmadan demokrasi olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar doğuştan eşittirler ama bunu sonuna kadar sürdüremezler.
tr_quotes.author: Montesquieu

tr_quotes.quote: Birbirlerini tanımayan, birbirlerinden şüphe eden kitlelerin bulunduğu yerde ne sulhüsalah yani barış, ne de onurlu bir eşitlik olur.
tr_quotes.author: İlber Ortaylı

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar eşittir. Fark doğuştan değil erdemden doğar.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Zayıf, daima adalet ve eşitlik ister, halbuki bunlar kuvvetlinin umurunda bile değildir.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar kuvvetçe, zekaca olmasalar bile, anlaşma ve hak yolu ile eşit olurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Hümanist, şiddet içermeyen ütopya; o sözde “aydın” ve “ilerici” insanlar, eşitlik ve hak kavramlarını bu gezegeni beraber paylaştığımız canlıları da kapsayacak şekilde genişletene dek ikiyüzlü bir yalan olarak kalacak.
tr_quotes.author: Steve Best

tr_quotes.quote: Eşitlik ancak daha iyi durumdakilerin özgürlüklerini kısıtlayarak sağlanabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Yuval Noah Harari

tr_quotes.quote: Şu gerçeği aşikar kabul ederiz: Bütün insanlar yaratıcıları tarafından eşit yaratılmıştır ve bazı vazgeçilemez haklara sahiptir. Yaşamak, özgürlük ve kendi mutluluğunu arama hakkı böyle haklardandır.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlığın başına ne geldiyse eşitlik olmaması yüzünden geldi.
tr_quotes.author: Pierre Leroux

tr_quotes.quote: Cinsiyet eşitliği silahlı kuvvetten daha başarılıdır
tr_quotes.author: Zapatero

tr_quotes.quote: Bir ülkenin ekonomisi beşeri sermayesine dayanır. Eğer kadınlara yeterli sağlık, eğitim ve iş olanakları sunmuyorsanız, potansiyelinizin yarısını kaybedersiniz. Cinsiyet eşitliği ve kadın hakları ekonomik kalkınmanın temelidir.
tr_quotes.author: Michelle Bachelet

tr_quotes.quote: Eşitlik farklı şeylere benzer gözle bakmak değil. Eşitlik farklı seylere farklı gözle bakmak.
tr_quotes.author: Tom Robbins

tr_quotes.quote: Eşitlik! Evet, kavramı anlıyorum ama örnek bulamıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: G.H.Supergeon

tr_quotes.quote: Toplumsal eşitlik ve uyum, sadece kamusal görev üstlenmiş kişilerin insanların çıkarları uğruna kendi çıkarlarından vazgeçmeleri ya da onları ertelemeleriyle mümkün olabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar doğuştan eşittirler: ama bunu sonuna kadar sürdüremezler.
tr_quotes.author: Montesquieu

tr_quotes.quote: Eşitlik herkese aynı davranmak değil, herkese aynı özeni göstermektir.
tr_quotes.author: Ahmet Ümit

en_quotes.quote: We will never have true civilization until we have learned to recognize the rights of others
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: The worst form of inequality is to try to make unequal things equal
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: Nobody can give you freedom. Nobody can give you equality or justice or anything. If you're a man, you take it
en_quotes.author: Malcolm X

en_quotes.quote: If you want to see the true measure of a man, watch how he treats his inferiors, not his equals
en_quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: There never will be complete equality until women themselves help to make laws and elect lawmakers
en_quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

en_quotes.quote: If we cannot now end our differences, at least we can help make the world safe for diversity
en_quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: People are pretty much alike. It's only that our differences are more susceptible to definition than our similarities
en_quotes.author: Linda Ellerbee

en_quotes.quote: All this talk about equality. The only thing people really have in common is that they are all going to die
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: Candor is a compliment; it implies equality. It's how true friends talk
en_quotes.author: Peggy Noonan

en_quotes.quote: I believe in the spirit of equality and the spirit of this country as one of love and compassion and kindness
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: No struggle can ever succeed without women participating side by side with men
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

en_quotes.quote: Women will only have true equality when men share with them the responsibility of bringing up the next generation
en_quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

en_quotes.quote: Gender equality will only be reached if we are able to empower women
en_quotes.author: Michelle Bachelet

en_quotes.quote: All men are created equal, it is only men themselves who place themselves above equality
en_quotes.author: David Allan Coe

en_quotes.quote: I believe in equality for everyone, except reporters and photographers
en_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

en_quotes.quote: Gender equality is not only an issue for women and girls
en_quotes.author: Justin Trudeau

en_quotes.quote: Any serious shift towards more sustainable societies has to include gender equality
en_quotes.author: Helen Clark

en_quotes.quote: Terrorism does not disappear with revenge tactics but through making justice and equality before law a reality
en_quotes.author: Asma Jahangir

en_quotes.quote: I think that overall, the position - on a whole host of issues - should always be toward inclusion and equality
en_quotes.author: Loretta Lynch

en_quotes.quote: I want for myself what I want for other women, absolute equality
en_quotes.author: Agnes Macphail

en_quotes.quote: Virtue can only flourish among equals
en_quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

en_quotes.quote: As long as we set up equality, we'll go in the right direction
en_quotes.author: Venus Williams

en_quotes.quote: The idea of equal rights was in the air
en_quotes.author: Lucy Stone

en_quotes.quote: Equality should be a thing we don't even have to talk about anymore
en_quotes.author: Hilary Knight

en_quotes.quote: I am a universalist, passionately devoted to the cause of equality within the human family
en_quotes.author: Theodore Bikel

en_quotes.quote: Equality in education is my number one battle
en_quotes.author: Najat Vallaud-Belkacem

en_quotes.quote: Canada is the homeland of equality, justice and tolerance
en_quotes.author: Kim Campbell

en_quotes.quote: Vote Love' means vote equality. It means vote change. It means vote what's right for humanity
en_quotes.author: Macklemore

en_quotes.quote: Americans are so enamored of equality that they would rather be equal in slavery than unequal in freedom
en_quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

en_quotes.quote: The earth is the mother of all people, and all people should have equal rights upon it
en_quotes.author: Chief Joseph

en_quotes.quote: Achieving gender equality requires the engagement of women and men, girls and boys. It is everyone's responsibility
en_quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

en_quotes.quote: Coming generations will learn equality from poverty, and love from woes
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: To be successful, a woman has to be much better at her job than a man
en_quotes.author: Golda Meir

en_quotes.quote: I believe in unconditional love and equality. Jesus Christ exemplified these qualities
en_quotes.author: Jack Canfield

en_quotes.quote: You can't state difference and also state equality. We have to state sameness to understand equality
en_quotes.author: Zadie Smith

en_quotes.quote: Growing up, my parents treated my brother and me with absolute equality
en_quotes.author: Anushka Sharma

en_quotes.quote: The state controlling a woman would mean denying her full autonomy and full equality
en_quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

en_quotes.quote: I am free of all prejudices. I hate everyone equally
en_quotes.author: W. C. Fields

en_quotes.quote: We are coming down from our pedestal and up from the laundry room
en_quotes.author: Bella Abzug

en_quotes.quote: Suffrage is the pivotal right
en_quotes.author: Susan B. Anthony

en_quotes.quote: I believe in free education, free healthcare. But I do not believe in equality
en_quotes.author: Nicolas Winding Refn

en_quotes.quote: The emotional, sexual, and psychological stereotyping of females begins when the doctor says: It's a girl
en_quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm

en_quotes.quote: Equality is not in regarding different things similarly, equality is in regarding different things differently
en_quotes.author: Tom Robbins

en_quotes.quote: The year was 2081, and everyone was finally equal
en_quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

en_quotes.quote: Nature has made men free and equal. The distinctions necessary for social order are only founded on general utility
en_quotes.author: Marquis de Lafayette

en_quotes.quote: Liberty and equality are captivating sounds, but they often captivate to destroy
en_quotes.author: John Tyler

en_quotes.quote: Political Freedom without economic equality is a pretense, a fraud, a lie; and the workers want no lying
en_quotes.author: Mikhail Bakunin

en_quotes.quote: The moral case for gender equality is obvious. It should not need any explanation
en_quotes.author: Paul Polman

en_quotes.quote: Equality as a principle is at the heart of our democracy
en_quotes.author: Raja Krishnamoorthi

en_quotes.quote: There is no justice in social justice, and there is no equality in social equality
en_quotes.author: Brad Thor

en_quotes.quote: Everybody thinks that equality comes from identifying people, and that's not where equality comes from
en_quotes.author: Matt Bomer

en_quotes.quote: I'm trying to create the world around myself to be a place of as much equality and openheartedness as possible
en_quotes.author: Robin Thicke

en_quotes.quote: The test for whether or not you can hold a job should not be the arrangement of your chromosomes
en_quotes.author: Bella Abzug

en_quotes.quote: Citizens standing up for equality and freedom can never be equated with white supremacists, neo-Nazis, and the KKK
en_quotes.author: Gary Cohn

en_quotes.quote: My mum fought for feminism in her day so instilled in me the importance of equality. She taught me so much about women
en_quotes.author: Chris Evans

en_quotes.quote: All the people like us are we, and everyone else is They
en_quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

en_quotes.quote: Socialism values equality more than liberty
en_quotes.author: Dennis Prager

en_quotes.quote: We came equals into this world, and equals shall we go out of it
en_quotes.author: George Mason

en_quotes.quote: The battle for women's rights has been largely won
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: Proclaim human equality as loudly as you like, Witless will serve his brother
en_quotes.author: Thomas Huxley

en_quotes.quote: Women are the only exploited group in history to have been idealized into powerlessness
en_quotes.author: Erica Jong

en_quotes.quote: Marriage equality is not an issue of politics: it is an issue of justice achieved by political means
en_quotes.author: Andy Dunn

en_quotes.quote: The cry of equality pulls everyone down
en_quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

en_quotes.quote: While the law cannot force a person to be moral or tolerant, through the law we can demand respect and expect equality
en_quotes.author: Donna Brazile

en_quotes.quote: The arc of our history is toward more equality being expanded to more and more people
en_quotes.author: George Takei

en_quotes.quote: We who are liberal and progressive know that the poor are our equals in every sense except that of being equal to us
en_quotes.author: Lionel Trilling

en_quotes.quote: Is word, sound, and powa dat break down de barriers of oppression an drive away transgression an rule equality
en_quotes.author: Peter Tosh

en_quotes.quote: I want my daughters to live in a world where there is equality and parity of pay
en_quotes.author: Joseph Fiennes

en_quotes.quote: I feel like a feminist is gender equality
en_quotes.author: Ilana Glazer

en_quotes.quote: Equality may perhaps be a right, but no power on earth can ever turn it into a fact
en_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

en_quotes.quote: Equality for women is progress for all
en_quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

en_quotes.quote: I'm a Christian. I want the world of justice and equality. This is the only way to achieve peace
en_quotes.author: Hugo Chavez

en_quotes.quote: More countries have understood that women's equality is a prerequisite for development
en_quotes.author: Kofi Annan

en_quotes.quote: Sorry, equality is a myth. Women aren't as strong as men - they can't even hold their booze as well as men
en_quotes.author: Gavin McInnes

en_quotes.quote: His lordship may compel us to be equal upstairs, but there will never be equality in the servants hall
en_quotes.author: James M. Barrie

en_quotes.quote: Do not call for black power or green power. Call for brain power
en_quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

en_quotes.quote: As equality increases, so does the number of people struggling for predominance
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: The way the Democrats go about seeking equality is to lower people at the top
en_quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

en_quotes.quote: It is clear that not in one thing alone, but in many ways equality and freedom of speech are a good thing
en_quotes.author: Herodotus

en_quotes.quote: Jackie Robinson, as an athlete and as someone who was trying to make a stand for equality, he was exemplary
en_quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

en_quotes.quote: Sweden is a good country to raise a family in because there is an equality there I don't feel in the States
en_quotes.author: Alexander Skarsgard

en_quotes.quote: Marriage equality is not a choice. It is a legal right
en_quotes.author: Cory Booker

en_quotes.quote: There's a beauty in being part of a band, when there's equality and trust
en_quotes.author: Scott Weiland

en_quotes.quote: Nobody really believes in equality anyway
en_quotes.author: Warren Farrell

en_quotes.quote: Bumble is about equality. We are reverse-engineering traditional societal norms
en_quotes.author: Whitney Wolfe Herd

en_quotes.quote: At some point we have to stop and say, There's Marlee, not, There's the deaf actress
en_quotes.author: Marlee Matlin

en_quotes.quote: American society will never completely understand the true meaning of equality
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: I'm all for the equality
en_quotes.author: Rumer Willis

en_quotes.quote: I am for 100% equality across the board for everybody, in all walks of life
en_quotes.author: David Furnish

en_quotes.quote: Marriage equality is coming, and not merely to a theater near you
en_quotes.author: Suzanne Brockmann

en_quotes.quote: I hope that we always have diversity, that we have equality and representation every step of the way
en_quotes.author: Marsai Martin

en_quotes.quote: All sports must be treated on the basis of equality
en_quotes.author: Pierre de Coubertin

en_quotes.quote: A woman who thinks she is intelligent demands the same rights as man. An intelligent woman gives up
en_quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

en_quotes.quote: The man who didn't want his wife to work has been succeeded by the man who asks about her chances of getting a raise
en_quotes.author: Earl Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Equality and self-determination should never be divided in the name of religious or ideological fervor
en_quotes.author: Rita Dove

en_quotes.quote: We must keep fighting until using the word 'equality' isn't necessary because we will all be living as one
en_quotes.author: Michelle Visage

en_quotes.quote: Equality is like gravity. We need it to stand on this earth as men and women
en_quotes.author: Joss Whedon

en_quotes.quote: Fairness is not about statistical equality
en_quotes.author: John Bercow

en_quotes.quote: I would love for women to be focused on maximum wage, and I have fought to be recognized with equality for a long time
en_quotes.author: Marsha Blackburn

en_quotes.quote: I think preaching equality among unequals is the worst form of discrimination
en_quotes.author: P. Chidambaram

en_quotes.quote: Equality implies individuality
en_quotes.author: Trey Anastasio

en_quotes.quote: To take women's equality from novelty to norm, we need to change narratives at a societal and individual level
en_quotes.author: Cathy Engelbert

en_quotes.quote: I never understood why women wanted equality in the workplace when in fact, that would be selling them short
en_quotes.author: Jay Samit

en_quotes.quote: Any government I lead will continue with the equality of gay and lesbian people
en_quotes.author: David Cameron

en_quotes.quote: In New York City, the idea that district schools advance equality is a myth
en_quotes.author: Eva Moskowitz

en_quotes.quote: Democratic principles are the result of equality of condition
en_quotes.author: Mercy Otis Warren

en_quotes.quote: Equality and separation cannot exist in the same space
en_quotes.author: Jason Mraz

en_quotes.quote: Sharing presumes and creates equality
en_quotes.author: Clemantine Wamariya

en_quotes.quote: Marriage equality changed life for people
en_quotes.author: Andrew Cuomo

en_quotes.quote: I want girls to know that equality exists in this world. You can do anything you want
en_quotes.author: Yuna

en_quotes.quote: I just believe in equality for all
en_quotes.author: Ashley Wagner

en_quotes.quote: I wouldn't really call myself a feminist. I obviously want equality and equal opportunities to the men
en_quotes.author: Katie Taylor

en_quotes.quote: If we say we believe in equality for all then we must fight for equality for all, not betray our immigrant sisters
en_quotes.author: Christine Pelosi

en_quotes.quote: My goal is to eradicate poverty. I think we can't have equality until we eradicate poverty
en_quotes.author: Rain Dove

en_quotes.quote: In order to be great, you just have to care. You have to care about your world, community, and equality
en_quotes.author: Katori Hall

en_quotes.quote: Today, it's about gender equality, not neutrality. Anyone who doesn't agree would be a bit of an idiot
en_quotes.author: Twinkle Khanna

en_quotes.quote: Democracy does not guarantee equality of conditions - it only guarantees equality of opportunity
en_quotes.author: Irving Kristol

en_quotes.quote: Our locker room is so positive. We are all focused on the same objectives, and that's equality for women
en_quotes.author: Naomi

en_quotes.quote: In science, all facts, no matter how trivial or banal, enjoy democratic equality
en_quotes.author: Mary McCarthy

en_quotes.quote: My life won't have full quality until we achieve equality for all
en_quotes.author: Sandi Toksvig

en_quotes.quote: Equality for everybody is great. That would be amazing
en_quotes.author: Rob Lowe

en_quotes.quote: Equality and prosperity shouldn't be seen as enemies of each other, but as partners. One reinforces the other
en_quotes.author: Nicola Sturgeon

en_quotes.quote: True gender equality in Scotland - and elsewhere - is still some way off
en_quotes.author: Nicola Sturgeon

en_quotes.quote: My pledge to you is that the SNP will put women and gender equality right at the heart of the Westminster agenda
en_quotes.author: Nicola Sturgeon

en_quotes.quote: There is no denying that we have made great progress toward gender equality
en_quotes.author: Stephanie Coontz

en_quotes.quote: Each country has a soul, and France's soul is equality
en_quotes.author: Francois Hollande

en_quotes.quote: What I find most interesting about the U.S. is this idea of equality
en_quotes.author: Jorge Ramos

en_quotes.quote: I think men are allowed to be fat and bald and ugly and women aren't. And it's just not - there is no equality there
en_quotes.author: Connie Chung

en_quotes.quote: I'm all for equality
en_quotes.author: Amber Liu

en_quotes.quote: One hundred and fifty years after Lincoln's Gettysburg Address, equality for many Americans remains elusive
en_quotes.author: Mike Quigley

en_quotes.quote: The need for a national Employment Non-Discrimination Act a critical part of the LGBT community's struggle for equality
en_quotes.author: Jared Polis

en_quotes.quote: The path to equality is rarely easy
en_quotes.author: Daniel Dae Kim

en_quotes.quote: The battle goes on for me; as a gay man, I shall not be happy until I see equality across the board
en_quotes.author: Rob Halford

en_quotes.quote: Democracy not only requires equality but also an unshakable conviction in the value of each person, who is then equal
en_quotes.author: Jeane Kirkpatrick

en_quotes.quote: We live in a world where equality is pretty important
en_quotes.author: John Key

en_quotes.quote: Together, we can build the kind of world in which we all seek to live, one of universal equality and justice
en_quotes.author: Lynn Schusterman

en_quotes.quote: All imaginable futures are not equally possible
en_quotes.author: Kevin Kelly

en_quotes.quote: We want order and security, and we want liberty. And we want not only liberty but equality as well
en_quotes.author: David Souter

en_quotes.quote: The struggle for equality is really a struggle for democracy, and that's why it's a struggle for all the population
en_quotes.author: Ayman Odeh

en_quotes.quote: My commitment to gender equality is rooted in the quintessentially American principle of equal justice under law
en_quotes.author: Eric Schneiderman

en_quotes.quote: Gender equality is one of the principles we will never compromise at Accenture
en_quotes.author: Pierre Nanterme

en_quotes.quote: The sole equality on earth is death
en_quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

en_quotes.quote: Throughout American history, whites have played a significant role in helping blacks secure freedom and equality
en_quotes.author: Jesse Lee Peterson

en_quotes.quote: We need an inspiring vision of equality that resonates in the hearts, minds, and souls of all Americans
en_quotes.author: Bill de Blasio

en_quotes.quote: Equality and development will not be achieved however if peace is not understood from women's' point of view
en_quotes.author: Jenny Shipley

en_quotes.quote: A resilient people cherishing liberty and equality and the rule of law will endure
en_quotes.author: Nick Rahall

en_quotes.quote: Really, feminism is just about equality, and that's all. It's just saying equal rights
en_quotes.author: Abi Morgan

en_quotes.quote: The word 'equality' shows up too much in our founding documents for anyone to pretend it's not the American way
en_quotes.author: Martha Plimpton

en_quotes.quote: Do people really want liberty, equality, fraternity? Is it not some manner of speaking?
en_quotes.author: Krzysztof Kieslowski

en_quotes.quote: Give us equality of enjoyment, equal right to expansion - it is as necessary to our prosperity as yours
en_quotes.author: Robert Toombs

en_quotes.quote: Conservatives often say that we should care not about equality of outcomes but about equality of opportunity
en_quotes.author: Timothy Noah

en_quotes.quote: Republican presidents talk about freedom. Democratic presidents talk about equality
en_quotes.author: Timothy Noah

en_quotes.quote: I'm a feminist in the true sense of the word. It's about equality
en_quotes.author: Natalie Dormer

en_quotes.quote: How do we get to equality? I don't think it comes from fear. I think it comes from understanding
en_quotes.author: Rooney Mara

en_quotes.quote: Inequality can have a bad downside, but equality, for its part, sure does get in the way of coordination
en_quotes.author: Mary Douglas

en_quotes.quote: We have equality of men and women in western society, whereas in Islamic culture, women are inferior to men
en_quotes.author: Pim Fortuyn

en_quotes.quote: Is it written that equality between men and women means one can change sex? Obviously not
en_quotes.author: Najat Vallaud-Belkacem

en_quotes.quote: In 1965, I marched for equality
en_quotes.author: Alphonso Jackson

en_quotes.quote: In the end no segregationist scheme has withstood the force of a simple idea: equality under law
en_quotes.author: Eric Liu

en_quotes.quote: We really need to come behind and press for marriage equality in Northern Ireland
en_quotes.author: Leo Varadkar

en_quotes.quote: I see social mobility and equality of opportunity as really successful Canadian values
en_quotes.author: Chrystia Freeland

en_quotes.quote: My brother had the courage to come out in 1978, when equality was still a distant dream
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Esty

en_quotes.quote: I have supported civil rights activity in my state. I have done my job with integrity, equality, and fairness for all
en_quotes.author: Jeff Sessions

en_quotes.quote: There needs to be radical development in equality law to create the environment to allow women to stay in work
en_quotes.author: Ken Livingstone

en_quotes.quote: Everyone who knows me knows my respect for women: equality and respect
en_quotes.author: Emre Can

en_quotes.quote: The women's movement in the 1970s led more women into the workforce and got them closer to pay equality
en_quotes.author: Rebecca Traister

en_quotes.quote: I support marriage equality and oppose legislation that defines marriage as only being between a man and a woman
en_quotes.author: Bill Foster

en_quotes.quote: Most of all, we should remember all of us are capable of individually helping advance the spirit of equality for all
en_quotes.author: Mike Rogers

en_quotes.quote: Ending discrimination and extending equality should always be a national priority
en_quotes.author: Bill Shorten

en_quotes.quote: The seeds of marriage equality... were planted on MTV
en_quotes.author: Wilson Cruz

en_quotes.quote: If we are Russian citizens, treat us as Russian citizens. We want equality and justice
en_quotes.author: Ramzan Kadyrov

en_quotes.quote: We should honor - not attack - those who have stood up for equality and other cherished American values
en_quotes.author: Brian Krzanich

en_quotes.quote: Feminism, to me, is nothing more and nothing less than the belief in equality for women
en_quotes.author: Kodie Shane

en_quotes.quote: We don't live in a society that has genuine equality, and every woman we know has experienced that
en_quotes.author: Sara Sheridan

en_quotes.quote: Equality under the law is the slow triumph of hope over history
en_quotes.author: Jim Cooper

en_quotes.quote: Stewardesses are still paid so little that in many cases, new hires qualify for food stamps
en_quotes.author: Patricia Ireland

en_quotes.quote: Equality is the soul of liberty; there is, in fact, no liberty without it
en_quotes.author: Frances Wright

en_quotes.quote: Such security is equal liberty. But it is not necessarily equality in the use of the earth
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Tucker

en_quotes.quote: The idea of bringing equality not just to entertainment but to every walk of life - I think it's very important
en_quotes.author: Ellie Bamber

en_quotes.quote: Under Tunisian law, a woman can divorce her husband. Total equality
en_quotes.author: Rashid al-Ghannushi

en_quotes.quote: An idea like equality between men and women, which is now accepted in the West, is quite new
en_quotes.author: Antonio Munoz Molina

en_quotes.quote: A few British suffragettes everybody laughed at started the cause of equality between men and women
en_quotes.author: Antonio Munoz Molina

en_quotes.quote: We are also further than ever from equality of opportunity
en_quotes.author: Ferdinand Mount

en_quotes.quote: All men are born equally free
en_quotes.author: Salmon P. Chase

en_quotes.quote: The only way to ensure equality for women is to clearly declare it in our Constitution
en_quotes.author: Carolyn Maloney

en_quotes.quote: I don't believe in social equality, and they know it
en_quotes.author: George Smathers

en_quotes.quote: We are a model country where gender equality is concerned
en_quotes.author: Tarja Halonen

en_quotes.quote: Private religious speech can't be discriminated against. It has to be treated equally with secular speech
en_quotes.author: Samuel Alito

en_quotes.quote: The highest political buzz word is not liberty, equality, fraternity or solidarity; it is service
en_quotes.author: Arthur Hugh Clough

en_quotes.quote: I am an aristocrat. I love liberty; I hate equality
en_quotes.author: John Randolph

en_quotes.quote: Demands for equality for women are threats to men's self-esteem and sense of sexual turf
en_quotes.author: Alice S. Rossi

en_quotes.quote: I refuse to consign the whole male sex to the nursery. I insist on believing that some men are my equals
en_quotes.author: Brigid Brophy

en_quotes.quote: The extension of women's rights is the basic principle of all social progress
en_quotes.author: Charles Fourier

en_quotes.quote: Equality means nothing unless incorporated into the institutions
en_quotes.author: Slobodan Milosevic

en_quotes.quote: I think 'I Spy,' still when you look at it, speaks volumes in terms of propaganda for equality. It's just magnificent
en_quotes.author: Bill Cosby
